{htm(NAME)}, Your personal settings

Here you can change your personal settings

These settings will effect the visibility of your personal data.
These settings will be applied instantly and can be changed back everytime.


{if ok}
Your settings were saved successfully!
{endif} {if err}
An error has occurred. Please check your entries.
{endif}
{subtpl(tpl/{SYS_TPL_LANG}/my-settings-nav.htm,*)} {endif}
My data
Display my contactdata / address
Show my personal data to the following persons
(Only the address / companyname will be displayed)
Contact
Other users can send you messages via our system.
Add as contact
Other users can send me a contact request.
Show user online
Othehr users can see you online, if you are.
Comments
Presetting for comments
Sets if comments are standardly allowed to your adverts/events/... or not allowed.
Attention: Existing adverts / events / groups stay unchanged!
Comments to the company
Sets if people can write comments about your company.
Confirm comments manually
Other users comments are visible once you checked them. 		{if COMMENT_CONFIRM} The markteplaceowner sets a manually confirmation for comments, that is why this setting ins unavailable. {else} {endif}
Notifications
E-Mail notification on new messages
Do you want to receive an E-Mail, if someone sends you a message?
E-mail notification about new forum posts
Do you want to get an E-Mail, if someone answered on your forum post?
Notify me before an advert runs out
Do you want to recieve an E-Mail, if one of your adverts run out?
Adresses
Standard billing address
Which standard billing address shall be used? 		{subtpl(tpl/{SYS_TPL_LANG}/user_invoice.htm,*)}
